data.event: Lode is the location of Anglesey Abbey, which was formerly the home of the Fairhaven family, who lived there for many years, but is now the property of the National Trust.
Convinced that Lode merited its own church, he built the present church of St James, which was dedicated in 1853.

event.title: provided a vicar for the following 80 years

data.event: The Hailstone family provided a vicar for the following 80 years.
